Package org.vast.ogc.om

Class ProcedureRef

java.lang.Object
org.vast.ogc.xlink.SimpleLink<T>
org.vast.ogc.xlink.CachedReference<T>
org.vast.ogc.gml.FeatureRef<IProcedure>
org.vast.ogc.om.ProcedureRef
All Implemented Interfaces:
IFeature, IProcedure, IXlinkReference<IProcedure>, IResource
public class ProcedureRef extends FeatureRef<IProcedure> implements IProcedure

Wrapper class for use when an IProcedure object is or can be included by reference. This enables fetching and instantiating the target object lazily.

Since:
Sep 28, 2012
